actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make funding available to carry out the Maximum Economic Growth for America Through Highway Funding Act.
short_title: Maximum Economic Growth for America Through Highway Funding Part II Act

summary.text: Maximum Economic Growth for America Through Highway Funding Part II Act or the MEGA Fund Part II Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend for six years the availability of funds in the Highway Trust Fund authorized under specified provisions of the Highway Revenue Act of 1956, the Surface Transportation Assistance Act of 1982, the Surface Transportation and Uniform Relocation Assistance Act of 1987, the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991, and the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century.Makes such funding available to the Maximum Economic Growth for America Through Highway Funding Act.

titles.title: Maximum Economic Growth for America Through Highway Funding Part II Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make funding available to carry out the Maximum Economic Growth for America Through Highway Funding Act.
